description: When an alarm message is generated by the device an
apSyslogMessageGenerated notification is sent if the alarm
is not associated with a alarm specific notification.
The sending of these notifications can be enabled/disabled
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogMessageGenerated APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistFrom s EXAMPLE APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistLevel i 3 APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistType s EXAMPLE APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistContent s EXAMPLE APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistTimestamp t 31536000

$SNMPTRAPCMD APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogMessageGenerated APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistFrom s EXAMPLE APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistLevel i 7 APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistType s EXAMPLE2 APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistContent s EXAMPLE APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistTimestamp t 31536000

description: The process name and host of the sending client.
variables.name: APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistFrom

description: A textual identification for the Log-Type, which
variables.name: APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistType

description: The text of the message. If the text of the message
exceeds 255 bytes, the message will be truncated to
variables.name: APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistContent

description: The value of sysUpTime when this message was generated.
variables.name: APSYSLOG-MIB::apSyslogHistTimestamp
